name: setlista
description: A full-stack web application that allows users to search for artists on Setlist.fm, view their recent concerts, and create Spotify playlists from setlists.

scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint-fix: cd backend && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint-fix
scripts.pre-commit-check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test-coverage
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../frontend && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../infra && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.install-all: npm run setup-npmrc && npm install && npm run ci-verify
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules infra/node_modules package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json infra/package-lock.json && npm run install-all
